meanings.definition: The act of realizing or making real.
meanings.sent1: Her realization of the truth brought her peace.
meanings.sent2: The realization of his dream made him happy.
meanings.sent3: The realization that he forgot his lunch was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The realization hit her like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The sudden realization left him stunned.

meanings.definition: The state of being realized or made real.
meanings.sent1: The realization of her efforts was rewarding.
meanings.sent2: His realization of the danger saved him from harm.
meanings.sent3: The realization of how silly he looked was funny.
meanings.sent4: The realization dawned on her slowly.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful realization filled her with joy.

meanings.definition: The result of realizing or making real.
meanings.sent1: The realization of their hard work was evident in the final product.
meanings.sent2: The sudden realization of the mistake led to quick action.
meanings.sent3: The realization of how much she spent was surprising.
meanings.sent4: The realization brought a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent5: The final realization brought closure to the project.
